title: Build-A-Bear CEO on Record Quarter Results
itunes:title: Build-A-Bear CEO on Record Quarter Results
description:
Build-A-Bear Workshop CEO Sharon Price John discusses the company's most profitable third quarter in its nearly 25 year history.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
